Loc Class Reference
Location Interface

Location API (GPS) More...

#include <Loc.hpp>

Detailed Description

The Location API allows access to all the GPS data.

static void Loc::snprint ( char *  buffer,
int  capacity,
i32  value,
bool  lat 
)
static

This method will format a coordinate.

char lat[32];
char lon[32];
Loc:snprint(lat, 32, -123456789, true);
Loc:snprint(lon, 32, -123456789, false);
printf("%s, %s\n", lat, lon);

The above code will output "S 12.345 W 12.345"
